scripts.serve: CLOUD_RUNTIME_CONFIG="$(DOPPLER_PROJECT=members-captainssounds-com DOPPLER_CONFIG=dev doppler secrets download --no-file | jq '{doppler: .}')" npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.shell: CLOUD_RUNTIME_CONFIG="$(DOPPLER_PROJECT=members-captainssounds-com DOPPLER_CONFIG=dev doppler secrets download --no-file | jq '{doppler: .}')" npm run build && firebase functions:shell
scripts.secrets-sync: firebase functions:config:unset doppler && firebase functions:config:set doppler="$(DOPPLER_PROJECT=members-captainssounds-com DOPPLER_CONFIG=prd doppler secrets download --no-file)"
scripts.deploy: npm run secrets-sync && firebase deploy --only functions
